name: Corporate Security Training
description: Enhancing organizational defenses against social engineering threats.

cards.title: Training Employees on Security Awareness
cards.description: Ensuring all employees are trained in security best practices.
cards.bulletpoints: Security Workshops, Threat Recognition, Access Control Policies

cards.title: Mitigating Insider Threats
cards.description: Identifying and neutralizing insider threats before they cause damage.
cards.bulletpoints: Employee Monitoring, Threat Reporting, Behavioral Red Flags
